{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3477446,"name":"Joseph Phillip Harrison","username":"Mechanical_Hands","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mechanical_hands/{size}/180741_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-10T00:05:31.417Z","cooked":"

Greetings FIM and Beyond!

Team 5907 CC Shambots is pleased to announce “Open Shop,” our first open machine shop session for the 2025 season! We will hold open shop hours Saturdays during the build season starting January 18th. Teams can manufacture their part designs in Detroit Catholic Central’s new STEM wing.

Where: Detroit Catholic Central High School 27225 Wixom Rd, Novi, MI 48374

When: every Saturday from 1/18 - 2/15, 3:00 - 6:00 pm

You provide:

  1. CAD design for the part(s)
  2. Stock to make the part with
  3. At least 1 mentor and 1 team member present at the shop
  4. Merch and stickers to trade (optional!)

CC Robotics provides:

  1. CAM for the design

  2. An experienced mentor/student to help with the machining

  3. Processing for the rough cut stock if necessary

  4. A wide range of subtractive manufacturing machines including

  5. Manual Mill

  6. Manual Lathe

  7. 3 24x33” CNC Mills w/ tube mounts

  8. A 23x35” laser cutter/engraver

  9. 48x48” plasma cutter

  10. Various metal cutting saws

  11. Drill presses

  12. Belt sander

How to sign up:

  • Complete the Google form here Link

Once confirmed, you’ll receive a confirmation email with all the details.

Team 5907 looks forward to working with as many teams as possible this season. Due to space constraints, we are offering Open Shops on a first come, first serve basis to no more than FOUR (4) teams per day.

For questions and flexible scheduling, contact Team Captain Joe Harrison at 26harrisonj@catholiccentral.net. Please copy ccshambots@catholiccentral.net onto the Email as well.
